name: Escape Kowloon
description:
Escape Kowloon City! 

Find the way out of the city.

My first ever Game Jam game. Had 1 hour to complete the project per the Jam rules.

Theme was picked by the Jam creators.

Move by using directional arrows or "D.A.S.W." on keyboard.

Game was created in Game Maker Studio 2.

Sprites from Kenney @ http://kenney.nl/
